scripts.dev:react: npm run build:core && npx -w packages/react vite
scripts.dev:tool: npm run build:react && npx -w packages/tool vite
scripts.dev:editor: npm run build:react && npm -w packages/editor run dev
scripts.build:react: npm run build:core && npm -w packages/react run build
scripts.pub-patch:core: npm -w packages/core version patch && npm run build:core && npm -w packages/core publish
scripts.pub-patch:react: npm -w packages/react version patch && npm run build:react && npm -w packages/react publish
